page.title: 12Our School 1
page.content: Our school was built in 1965 and is called Roding Central Primary School. Children from nine villages come to the school. Originally there were separate village schools. The children come to school by coach,double decker bus,taxi,car and by walking. There are seven classrooms. We have a hall, where we do P.E and have our lunch,we have a library and a kitchen. Outside there is a playground and a large field. We also have a swimming pool. In charge of the school is a Headmistress. There are 7 teachers, 5 women and 2 men. We have a secretary and 2 welfare ladies who help in the classrooms. The children's ages range from 4 to 11 years and there are approximately 200 children in the school. We have an active P.T.A who raise money for the school by organising various events.
